PARAGRAPH.STRING: is the highest mountain in Kenya, and the second highest in Africa (after Mount Kilimanjaro). The highest peaks of
are Batian (5,199 m - 17,058 ft), Nelion (5,188 m - 17,022 ft) and Lenana (4,985 m - 16,355 ft).
is located in central Kenya, just south of the equator, around 150 km (95 miles) north-northeast of Nairobi. The area around

is protected in the Mount Kenya National Park, which is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site. The National Park is around 620 kmÂ² (240 square miles), and receives up to 15,000 visitors every year.
